description.en:
A mysterious incident occurs!!
A detective work that is completely different from "Condor King"!
A juvenile crime reporter looking for special news encounters a number of mysterious incidents...! He sets out to solve the cases out of his innate sense of justice!?


[Synopsis]
Akira, a young newspaper reporter from the Meiro Times, makes night rounds in search of special news... Starting with the murder case for which he was the first person to discover the crime, second and third cases occur. Will he be able to figure out the identity of the criminal and turn the secret into a real thing? (From episode 1, "Night Glowing Eyes") [Commentary] "


"Tokyo Patrol" was serialized in Akita Shoten's "Bokkenou" in 1959. is a boy detective work written by Tsunayoshi Takeuchi. This work often depicts the role of police, self-defense, and other forces when fighting against monsters and mysterious organizations. By making a life-sized boy the main character, his story is completely devoid of heroes. Although the two have in common that the main character is a newspaper reporter, it can be said to be a symmetrical work to "The Condor King''. Take a look at Takeuchi's world, which is a little different from detective action works!
